title: France's Leader Wants Europe to Be Stronger in the World
summary: French President Emmanuel Macron says Europe needs to act like a big power in the world. He thinks Europe faces threats from countries like China, Russia, and the US, so it's time to wake up and become stronger. Macron wants European countries to work together by sharing debt, which means borrowing money as a group to pay for important things like defense, clean energy, and technology. He believes this will help Europe compete better and protect its industries. Some countries, like Germany, are unsure about this idea because they worry about sharing costs. Macron also says Europe should be fair to its own producers by making rules that apply to everyone. Overall, he is calling for Europe to unite and take more responsibility on the global stage.

background_read: Europe is a group of countries that work together in the European Union (EU). French President Emmanuel Macron is a leader in Europe who wants the EU to be stronger and more united. He believes that by sharing money and making fair rules, Europe can better handle challenges from big countries like China and the US. This idea is about cooperation and protection to help Europe grow and stay safe in the world.
Article_Structure: WHAT: He urges Europe to act like a power by sharing debt and investing in key areas
WHERE: In Europe, specifically at an EU summit in Brussels
WHY: To help Europe compete globally and face threats from other countries

perspectives.description: Europe should unite and share resources to become a stronger global power.
